equipmentDescription_sword.english: It's a decent melee weapon. Forged by a skilled craftsman.
equipmentDescription_sword.german: Es ist eine ordentliche Nahkampfwaffe. Von einem fähigen Handwerker geschmiedet.
equipmentDescription_sword.french: C'est une arme de mêlée ordinaire. Forgée par un artisant expérimenté
equipmentDescription_sword.spanish: Un arma aceptable de melé. Forjada por un artesano habilidoso.
equipmentDescription_sword.bulgarian: Това е прилично меле оръжие. Прави се от опитен майстор.
equipmentDescription_sword.turkish: İyi bir yakın dövüş silahı. Kalifiye bir usta tarafından dövülmüş.
equipmentDescription_sword.portuges: É uma arma comum de combate corpo a corpo. Forjado por um artesão experiente

equipmentDescription_armorIron.english: Takes long to produce, but protects the bearer pretty well.
equipmentDescription_armorIron.german: Braucht lange in der Herstellung, aber schützt den Träger ziemlich gut.
equipmentDescription_armorIron.french: Prend du temps à fabriquer, mais protège assez bien le porteur
equipmentDescription_armorIron.spanish: Su producción es lenta, pero protege adecuadamente a quien la lleva
equipmentDescription_armorIron.bulgarian: Отнема много време да се направи, но предпазва носителя доста добре.
equipmentDescription_armorIron.turkish: Üretmesi uzun sürüyor, ancak hamilini oldukça iyi koruyor.
equipmentDescription_armorIron.portuges: Leva muito tempo para produzir, mas protege o portador muito bem.

equipmentDescription_doctorRobe.english: Protects the wearer from contagious diseases. Very useful for doctors as they have much contact with their ill patients.
equipmentDescription_doctorRobe.german: Schützt den Träger vor ansteckenden Krankheiten. Sehr nützlich für Ärzte, da sie viel Kontakt mit ihren kranken Patienten haben.
equipmentDescription_doctorRobe.french: Protège le porteur des maladies contagieuses. Très utile pour les docteurs qui sont au contact avec leurs patients malades.
equipmentDescription_doctorRobe.spanish: Protege al portador de enfermedades contagiosas. Muy útil para los doctores, que tienen contacto con pacientes enfermos.
equipmentDescription_doctorRobe.bulgarian: Защитава носителя от заразни болести. Много полезена за лекарите, тъй като те имат много контакт с болните си пациенти.
equipmentDescription_doctorRobe.turkish: Kullanıcıyı bulaşıcı hastalıklardan korur. Hastaları ile çok fazla temasta oldukları için doktorlar için çok faydalıdır.
equipmentDescription_doctorRobe.portuges: Protege o usuário de doenças contagiosas. Muito útil para os médicos, pois eles têm muito contato com seus pacientes doentes.

equipmentDescription_axe.english: With this axe, cutting wood takes half the time.
equipmentDescription_axe.german: Mit der Axt geht Holzfällen doppelt so schnell.
equipmentDescription_axe.french: Avec cette hâche, couper du bois prend deux fois moins de temps
equipmentDescription_axe.spanish: Con este hacha, cortar madera lleva la mitad de tiempo.
equipmentDescription_axe.bulgarian: С тази брадва рязането на дърва отнема половината от времето от колкото обикновено.
equipmentDescription_axe.turkish: Bu baltayla odun kesmek iki kat daha hızlı olur.
equipmentDescription_axe.portuges: Com esse machado, cortar madeira leva metade do tempo.

equipmentDescription_pickaxe.english: With this pickaxe, mining takes half the time.
equipmentDescription_pickaxe.german: Mit der Picke geht das Abbauen von Stein, Eisen und Kristallen doppelt so schnell.
equipmentDescription_pickaxe.french: Avec cette pioche, miner prend deux fois moins de temps
equipmentDescription_pickaxe.spanish: Con este pico, minar lleva la mitad de tiempo.
equipmentDescription_pickaxe.bulgarian: С тази кирка миньорството отнема половината от времето от колкото обикновено.
equipmentDescription_pickaxe.turkish: Bu kazma ile madencilik yarı zamanda tamamlanıyor
equipmentDescription_pickaxe.portuges: Com esta picareta, a mineração leva metade do tempo.

equipmentDescription_bow.english: Each arrow deals a serious amount of damage - if it hits.
equipmentDescription_bow.german: Jeder Pfeil kann den Gegner ernsthaft verletzen - wenn er trifft.
equipmentDescription_bow.french: Chaque flèche inflige de sérieux dégâts - si elle touche sa cible
equipmentDescription_bow.spanish: Cada flecha hace una gran cantidad de daño - si logra acertar.
equipmentDescription_bow.bulgarian: Всяка стрела прави сериозно поражение, ако оцелите противника.
equipmentDescription_bow.turkish: Her ok, isabet etmesi halinde, ciddi miktarda hasar verir.
equipmentDescription_bow.portuges: Cada flecha causa uma quantidade séria de dano - se acertar.

equipmentDescription_woodenClub.english: Simple weapon. Easy to make, not much damage.
equipmentDescription_woodenClub.german: Einfache Waffe. Schnell herstellbar, wenig Schaden.
equipmentDescription_woodenClub.french: Une arme rudimentaire. Simple à fabriquer, n'inflige pas beaucoup de dégâts.
equipmentDescription_woodenClub.spanish: Un arma simple. Fácil de construir, pero no hace mucho daño.
equipmentDescription_woodenClub.bulgarian: Нормално оръжие. Лесна за правене, не прави много голямо поръжение.
equipmentDescription_woodenClub.turkish: Basit silah. Kolayca yapılır, fazla hasar vermez.
equipmentDescription_woodenClub.portuges: Arma simples. Fácil de fazer, não muito dano.

equipmentDescription_wateringCan.english: You need to have a watering can to provide optimal care for your plants. Plants that have been watered correctly have been reported to yield double or triple harvests!
equipmentDescription_wateringCan.german: Du benötigst eine Gießkanne, um deine Pflanzen optimal zu pflegen. Pflanzen, die korrekt gegossen werden, können den doppelten oder dreifachen Ertrag abwerfen!
equipmentDescription_wateringCan.french: Vous devez avoir un arrosoir pour fournir des soins optimaux à vos plantes. Les plantes qui ont été arrosées correctement auront une récolte qui sera deux voire trois fois meilleure !
equipmentDescription_wateringCan.spanish: Necesitas tener una regadera para proporcionar el cuidado necesario a las plantas. ¡Aquellas plantas que han sido regadas correctamente pueden producir el doble o el triple de cosecha!
equipmentDescription_wateringCan.bulgarian: Трябва да имате лейка, за да осигурите оптимална грижа за вашите растения. Растенята които са поливани правилно добиват двойни или тройни реколти.
equipmentDescription_wateringCan.turkish: Bitkilerinize en uygun bakımı sağlamak için bir sulama kovasına ihtiyacınız var. Doğru bir şekilde sulanan bitkilerin çift veya üçlü hasat verdikleri bildirildi!
equipmentDescription_wateringCan.portuges: Você precisa ter um regador para fornecer o melhor atendimento para suas plantas. As plantas que foram regadas corretamente produziram colheitas duplas ou triplas!

equipmentDescription_farmerOutfit.english: This robust piece of work clothing is perfectly suited for working the fields. Wearing this, most farmers can sow their fields in half the time!
equipmentDescription_farmerOutfit.german: Dieses robuste Stück Arbeitskleidung eignet sich perfekt für Feldarbeit. Die meisten Farmer können mit dieser Ausrüstung ihre Pflanzen in der Hälfte der Zeit ansäen!
equipmentDescription_farmerOutfit.french: Ce vêtement de travail robuste est parfaitement adapté pour le travail dans les champs. En le portant, les fermiers peuvent semer leurs champs deux fois plus vite !
equipmentDescription_farmerOutfit.spanish: Esta vestimenta de trabajo es adecuada para trabajar en los cultivos. Si un granjero lo lleva podrá sembrar en la mitad de tiempo.
equipmentDescription_farmerOutfit.bulgarian: Това надеждно работно облекло е идеално за работа на полетата. Носеики това повечето фермери може да засаждат техните полета двойно по бързо!
equipmentDescription_farmerOutfit.turkish: Bu sağlam iş kıyafeti tarlalarda çalışmak için mükemmel bir uyum sağlar. Bunu giyerek çoğu çiftçi tarlalarını yarı zamanda ekebilir!
equipmentDescription_farmerOutfit.portuges: Esta peça robusta de trabalho é perfeitamente adequada para trabalhar nos campos. Usando isso, a maioria dos agricultores pode semear seus campos na metade do tempo!
